metadata.Title: CVE-2016-0836 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - high
metadata.Description: Stack-based buffer overflow in decoder/impeg2d_vld.c in mediaserver inAndroid 6.x before 2016-04-01 allows remote attackers to execute arbitrarycode or cause a denial of service (memory corruption) via a crafted mediafile, aka internal bug 25812590.

criterions.comment: android: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
